"Come now, just this one more little card!" 
"All right!" said D61okhov, having finished the addition. "All right! Twenty-one rubles," he said, pointing to the figure twenty-one by which the total exceeded the round sum of forty-three thousand; and taking up a pack he prepared to deal. Rost6v submissively unbent the corner of his card and, instead of the six thousand he had intended, carefully wrote twenty-one.
